scripts.dev: yarn dev:prepare && yarn _docker-compose -f docker/docker-compose.dev.yml -f docker/docker-compose.dev.override.yml --compatibility up --build
scripts.dev:cleanest: yarn dev:clean && find . -maxdepth 3 -regextype egrep -type d -regex '.*(\.volumes|\.data)$' -exec rm -rf {} \;
scripts.prod: yarn dev:prepare && yarn _docker-compose -f docker/docker-compose.prod.yml -f docker/docker-compose.dev.override.yml --compatibility up --build
scripts.prod:cleanest: yarn dev:clean && find . -maxdepth 3 -regextype egrep -type d -regex '.*(\.volumes|\.data)$' -exec rm -rf {} \;
